verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1781>commanded,<s%> <S%G5091><s%> 'Honor <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%>' <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2551><s%> 'He who speaks evil of <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him be <S%G5053>put<s%> to <S%G2288>death.<s%>'

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3739><s%> 'Whoever <S%G302>may<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G3739>"Whatever<s%> <S%G5623>help<s%> you <S%G1437>might<s%> otherwise have gotten <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> is <S%G1437>a<s%> gift devoted to <S%G1435>God,<s%>"

he <S%G3361>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5091>honor<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother.<s%>' <S%G2532>You<s%> have <S%G208>made<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G208>void<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> your <S%G3862>tradition.<s%>
<S%G1161>And<s%> in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> as <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> <S%G1778>rules<s%> made by <S%G444>men.<s%>'"

That which <S%G1525>enters<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that which proceeds <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "Do <S%G1492>you<s%> know <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4624>offended,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> this <S%G3056>saying?<s%>"

Leave <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G863>alone.<s%> They <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3594>guide<s%> the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> will <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G999>pit.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> the things which <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G2548>they<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> forth <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>sexual<s%> <S%G2829>sins,<s%> thefts, false <S%G5577>testimony,<s%> and <S%G988>blasphemies.<s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> the things which <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5495>with<s%> <S%G449>unwashed<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2036>"It<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2570>appropriate<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%>'s <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> it to the <S%G2952>dogs.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> is <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith!<s%> Be <S%G1096>it<s%> done to <S%G4671>you<s%> even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G2309>desire.<s%>" <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3844>near<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sat <S%G1563>there.<s%>

so <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> when they <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G2974>mute<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> injured <S%G5199>whole,<s%> <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walking,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%>- <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>they<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> "I have <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they continue <S%G4357>with<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5101>to<s%> <S%G5315>eat.<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G5101>to<s%> <S%G630>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3523>fasting,<s%> or they <S%G3379>might<s%> <S%G1590>faint<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G3598>way.<s%>"

<S%G846>The<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4159>"Where<s%> should we <S%G2254>get<s%> so <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2047>deserted<s%> place <S%G5620>as<s%> to <S%G5526>satisfy<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude?<s%>"

<S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2486>fish.<s%> He gave <S%G2168>thanks<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> <S%G2532>them,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>ate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G5526>filled.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> took <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> pieces that were left <S%G4052>over.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> he sent <S%G630>away<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> got <S%G1684>into<s%> <S%G1519>the<s%> <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G3093>Magdala.<s%>
